name: can•trip year two
description:
For two years, supporters of my Patreon received a new volume of can•trip, the Crashing Beasts & Crumbling Halls zine, each month. This bundle lets you catch up on the second year of the zine with over 50 pages of dungeon fantasy support.

  • a look at making artificer, berserker and martial artist characters
  • a completely new system for playing summoners, who call on powerful beings for aid, with potentially chaotic results
  • a new system for psionic characters
  • rules for finding and adventuring with hirelings
  • advice for creating and running terrifying dragons
  • rules for running journeys to and from the dungeon
  • ways to make healing and recovery exciting
  • rules for magical rituals with effects more complex than the standard spell
  • advice on using compels to make your adventures more tense and personal, narrating scenes and sessions, and even ending your campaign
